name: DiceFate Demo (A Failed Game Jam Project)
name_original: DiceFate Demo (A Failed Game Jam Project)
description:
It's a Project that I made within 20+ hours during GMTK 2020 Game Jam,

Unfortunately I have no time to test the game before the Deadline,

The Game END UP Crashing on 3rd Lvl,

Here's a Debugged one, FEEL FREE to give me feedbacks <3
